name: Bread Winners
description:
Bread Winners - a comedy/strategy card game for 4-6 players, where all the players are ducks except for one player, who is a goose. As the ducks, you all realize that there is a goose among the group and must gather all the needed personal items and bread as a group to make sure the goose does not take everything. As the goose, you want all the bread and that is the only thing on your mind. You must blend in with everyone in order to achieve that goal without being found out.

https://tabletopia.com/playground/bread-winners-iajear/play-now
